# Mobile Data Encryption

In this section of the Appdome Knowledge Base, learn to build Certified Secure™ mobile data encryption in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's DevSecOps automation platform in your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Use Appdome to fully automate the build, test, and release lifecycle of mobile data encryption in Android & iOS, encrypting mobile app data-at-rest and mobile end-user data in the application sandbox, SD card, Android & iOS files, assets, strings, resources, preferences, XML, Java, DEX, DLL, native libraries (.so) and more, fast. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact [support.appdome.com](https://support.appdome.com/).
